### Portfolio repo setup
To create the portfolio, sign into GitHub and create a new repository. On the terminal type "git init", "git add .", then "git commit -m "whatever you want to say"". Go back to the GitHub webpage and copy the URL into terminal ("git remote add origin http://remote_repository_URL"). Verify the URL with "git remote -v". Make your push to GitHub with the command "git push -u origin master". 

To push future changes follow the sequence: "git init", "git add .", "git commit -m "whatever you want to say"", then "git push". Use "git status" to ensure all changes uploaded succesfully.
